import React from 'react' const Form = ({setInputText,inputText, setTodos, todos}) => { const inputTextHandler = (e) => { setInputText(e.target.value) } const sunmitTodoHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setTodos([...todos, {text : inputText, completed : false, id : Math.random() * 1000}]) } return (
TO DO :
) } export default Form
